name: 陳仲萍
objective: 本課程內容包括邏輯閘的特性與功能測試，能利用積體電路完成各種基礎邏輯電路的組裝及設計，並能利用電子儀器進行量測、檢修。探討最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CAD軟體工具介紹。基礎邏輯閘實驗、組合邏輯實驗、加法器及減法器實驗、組合邏輯應用實驗、正反器邏輯實驗、循序邏輯電路應用實驗。
schedule:
Week- 1  Introduction to Digital System Design (2/21)
Week- 2  Holiday  二二八紀念日 (2/28)
Week- 3  Concurrent Code and Devices Design (3/7)
Week- 4  Simulation with VHDL Testbench(3/14)  
Week- 5  Testing with Pattern Generator and Digital Analyzer (3/21)
Week- 6  Sequential Code and Devices Design (3/28) 
Week- 7  Holiday 婦幼節 (4/4 )
Week- 8  Signal and Variables (4/11)
Week- 9  Midterm test (4/18)
Week- 10  Package and Component for System design (4/25)   
Week- 11  Function and Procedure in System Design (5/2)
Week- 12  Design with State Machines (5/9)
Week- 13  Introduction to DE2-115 (5/16)
Week- 14  Memoy and NIOS soft CPU and FPGA (5/23) 
Week- 15  Holiday 端午節 (5/30)
Week- 16  Synthesis with Quartus II (6/6) 
Week- 17  Qsys and NIOS-SOC (6/13)   
Week- 18  Final Test (6/20)
